title: Cerenovus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, Target a player and select a good role; the targeted player has to be mad that they are that role, or They might be lynched.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Mad is defined as an honest effort to convince people you are that role.

desc:
Post 3668
*”Reality is merely an opinion. Specifically, my opinion.”*
